alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 4:40PM MDT until August 04 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Western Kane County in southern Utah... Eastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain has fallen across the East Fork of the Virgin River. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Parunuweap Canyon within Zion National Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
